reference.title: Applications page
reference.shortdesc: The Applications page displays upon login, and features a table listing both deployed applications and the services that support .

ul.li: To display the details page of an application, click its name (in this example, Zenoss.core).
To display the Internal Services page, click Internal Services.

section.p: The space at the bottom-left of the menu bar displays the relative location of the page in the web interface hierarchy.
